description: The Biobuu Recycler initiative, also known as Mabwepande Compost, is a unique collaboration in Tanzania involving the government, the Hamburg municipality, and Biobuu, a private consultant. Launched in 2018, it focuses on recycling food waste from Dar es Salaam, producing organic fertilizers and animal feed from maggots. This innovative project aims to address waste management challenges while promoting sustainable practices and enhancing local agricultural productivity.
name: Biobuu Mabwepande
